author: Quantіan @quantian1
text: None of them, however, did the pencil and paper method, which is to note that if a rod of length L halfway equilibrates to 1 hot and 1 cold end, then to first order T(x) ~ (Th-Tc)(1-x/L), so it holds Q = 1/2*(Th-Tc)*L*A*rho*cp J of energy and L ~ 240 cm.  ADMISSION DENIED.
